title: Can people hack/lock up a club?
body:
Hey i had someone join my club recently and had his friends join too (i didn't mind it's not  an active thing) but didn't give them any permissions. 
Somehow it says "u are fired" in the bio thing and i can't accept/invite/kick anyone -all i can google is some duplication thing from way back so maybe he got enough friends in and claimed it was his? Anyway.
Weird.
Anyone heard of something like this?

replies.body:
I believe there were some issues a while back with new clubs created with the same name as an old one getting a bit stuck, though I don't know if that is what happened here.

Your best bet would be to submit a ticket to player support and they'll be able to help you: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
